tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CCTV_Footage (
  footage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE footage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    camera_id INT,
    footage_file BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    camera_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE criminal_investigations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR,
    suspect_name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CCTV_Footage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    camera_id INT NOT NULL,
    footage BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE Suspicious_Activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    confidence_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Suspects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Criminal_Records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_id INT NOT NULL,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    punishment VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT NOT NULL,
    investigator_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)
